title: Scariest game of all time?
body:
The scariest game I've ever played is amnesia, but I hear there are even scarier games out there?


I'm looking for that thrill of wanting to crawl into a corner without coming out and dreading every second. But it's difficult to achieve, tried system shock 2 and can't take it seriously enough because of the graphics unfortunately because I here its an insanely good game.

any recommends?
